title: ISic001672. I.Sicily inscription 001672
body:
Facsimile Images

χαῖ[ρε---]

Apparatus criticus

Text from photograph

English translation

Greetings!

commentary

The fragment is briefly contextualised by Portale et al. in a detailed discussion of the evidence for the decorative scheme and internal phases of the 'casa delle ghirlande', who associates this with material from the main decorative phase, dated to 60-50 BC; the house itself is partially lost due to landslides.

bibliography

    Portale, Milazzo, Montali 2020 166 and fig. 12.c https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002496
    Portale 2006 81 n.64 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001671
